chapters.title: Chapter 1: An Empty Road
chapters.info: Elisa al'Vere is the third oldest of five daughters of Marin and Bran al'Vere of Emond's Field. She is one year older than Nynaeve. See also al'Vere, Alene; al'Vere, Berowyn; al'Vere, Brandelwyn; al'Vere, Egwene; al'Vere, Elisa; al'Vere, Loise; al'Vere, Marin.
